Summaryhttp://naver.me/5g3OWTgRhttps://www.thedailystar.net/news/bangladesh/news/rice-pricier-even-peak-boro-season-3036271 8-10 Tk per kg for 2 weeks. In other kitchen markets, the price of coarse rice has risen to Tk 52-54 per kg and fine rice sold for Tk 65 to Tk 80 per kg yesterday. Follow the Daily Star's Google News channel for all the latest news. According to the Bangladesh Trade Corporation (TCB), the price of coarse grain and fine rice rose 5.38% and 3.17%, respectively, over the past seven days. Traders said the mill owners are not supplying enough rice to the market and prices could rise further if supply is not improved. When asked questions, Department of Agricultural Extension (DAE) director Benjir Alam said the market did not run out of rice because farmers had cultivated boroughs on 49.63 million hectares, 90,000 hectares more than last year. He said only about 18,500 hectares of rice fields have been affected by flooding this season. "Besides, the directing was good." DG expects to harvest 2.11 million tonnes of paddy this Boro season, adding that nearly 94% of the target has already been achieved. What's more, until the end of this month, farmers across the country continue to bring rice from the paddy fields. He blamed the merchants and millers for causing an artificial shortage in the market. However, several mill owners in other areas said the rice they bought from farmers was not ripe enough and not dried enough to produce rice immediately. Meanwhile, the government raided the whole country to control inflation, but it did not have much effect from the first day. Yesterday afternoon officials took a drive to the rice wholesale market in Old Dhaka Babu Bazaar, but found that most of the shops were closed. The Ministry of Food and Drug Safety and eight teams from the Ministry of Food and Drug Safety are scheduled to drive in the capital today. The movement began a day after the Cabinet directed officials to take action against companies involved in unauthorized rice business and stockpiling. Interior Minister Khandker Anwarul Islam said on Sunday that some conglomerates were stockpiling rice without legal approval. Yesterday, Siddikur Rahman, a resident of the capital Nahalpara, said from a chef in the capital, “I bought mini-ket rice for Tk 62 per kg. As the price of other daily necessities rose, I switched to BIRI-29. It was Tk 52. Now BIRI-29 is Tk 57 per kg. "We're trying really hard to cut our spending, but we're failing," he said. At the NA market in Dinajpur, one of the largest rice markets in the country, our correspondent discovered yesterday that Miniket rice sold for 3,200-3,300 Tk per 50 kg sack, BRRI-28 2,750-2,800 Tk, Paizam 2,600 Tk, Swarna. 2,300 Tk, Basmati 3,800 Tk. Traders said the price of a 50 kg sack had increased by Tk 400-500 in two weeks. "Prices change almost every day," said Golam Ravani, shopkeeper at the market. He blamed the mill owner for this. On the other hand, Azizul Iqbal Chowdhury, co-secretary of the Dinajpur Mill Operators' Association, argued that mill owners were buying the rice at a higher price. Rice prices in Kushtia increased by 4 Tk/kg on Saturday. Fresh Agro Mill's managing director, Umar Faruk, followed Azizul in blaming the price of rice. But the farmers disagree. Rice paddy prices have not risen, said Jakaria Hossain, a rice grower in Khajanagar, Kushtia. In Rajshahi, rice merchants blamed the lack of supply. Rain, hailstorms and pest attack have significantly reduced rice yields, they said. Nirod Baran Saha, president of Naogaon's Association of Rice and Rice Inventories and Wholesalers, said rice production in the Rajshahi region was 1.12 tonnes less than expected per hectare. "I expect rice prices to drop this week as millers can produce and supply rice," he said. Reporters from Rajshahi, Dinajpur and Kushtia contributed to this report. https://www.businessworld.in/article/India-s-Unusual-Wheat-Diplomacy/01-06-2022-430924/ Summary Sinsong Holdings, a state related to the weaponization of food resources in India

As the initial public offerings (IPOs) of pre-listed companies with the smallest total IPO amount for the first time in two years are shrinking, the market size is in an atmosphere of returning to before the spread of the novel coronavirus (COVID-19). Finally, last month recorded the minimum amount of public offering in two years. A reversal of the atmosphere seems unlikely as many of the IPOs that were originally scheduled are delaying their listing. According to the Korea Exchange on the 2nd, the total amount of public offering of newly listed stocks in May was 77.5 billion won. This is the smallest amount since May 2020 (21 billion won), the early stage of the spread of COVID-19. There were only three new listings, which was also the lowest in two years. This year, the public offering market is on a gradual downward trend. With the listing of LG Energy Solution at the beginning of the year, a 'domino public offering' was expected as a signal, but the market has been shrinking for several months. The public offering amount, which reached 12,816.7 billion won in January, fell sharply in February (337.9 billion won), and was cut in half in March (152.6 billion won). Since April (88.1 billion won), it has not reached 100 billion won. The industry cited the delisting of Daeeos as the first reason that the public offering market entered a cooling period in the first half of this year. A total of 10 public offering stocks were withdrawn from listing this year, of which 3 were also trillion-dollar IPOs. Last month, SK Shielders and OneStore attempted to enter the KOSPI, but withdrew their IPOs due to the lack of competition in institutional demand forecasting, and Hyundai Engineering also attempted to go public in February for the same reason. An official from the financial investment industry said, "The stock prices of companies have been sluggish since the recent listing." he explained. In fact, it is observed that stocks that suffered from measles due to overvalued controversies at the time of listing are not seeing growth after listing. According to Yuanta Securities, LG Energy Solution, KAKAO Bank, KAKAO Pay, and Krafton, which were listed in 2021-2022, lowered their forecast for this year's total operating profit from 3.6 trillion won in early January to 2.4 trillion won in April. Cho Chang-min, a researcher at Yuanta Securities, said, "If the downward revision of the operating profit forecast for 2022 continues in a situation where the forecast for 2021 has already been lower than the forecast, the uncertainty that investors feel about the newly listed companies will further increase." Experts point out that in order to recover the investment sentiment in the public offering market, it is necessary to set reasonable ransom prices by companies going for IPO. However, the market stagnation is expected to continue for a while as preliminary IPO stocks are delaying their IPO in consideration of market conditions rather than efforts to set an offering price. Except for the June spec, a total of 5 stocks are open for public offering, all of which are KOSDAQ stocks, with 0 stocks on the KOSPI. As Socar, Curly, Oasis, and K-Bank postponed their listing schedules, a drought was expected in the public market in the second half of the year. Lee Seok-hoon, a research fellow at the Korea Capital Market Research Institute, said, “The appropriate offering price is important to both IPO companies and investors. Therefore, an appropriate public offering will be of great help in the decision.” This year's IPO earnings are in vain, and it's likely next year.

World Stock Exchange Summary [US Market This Week Checkpoint] The New York Stock Exchange is expected to show volatility ahead of the May Consumer Price Index (CPI) to be released on the 10th this week (6th-10th). The May CPI, released this week, is expected to rise 8.2% from the previous year, a slower pace than in April. However, the rate of increase from the previous month is expected to be 0.7%, higher than the 0.3% increase in April. The market pays attention to inflation indicators because a slowdown in inflation can be a catalyst for a market rebound. If the CPI meets or falls below expectations, it could be a boon for the stock market, which took a step back last week. On the other hand, if you pour cold water on the expectation that the CPI has peaked, the pressure for the Fed to tighten more aggressively could be bad news for the stock market. In the past week, the three major indices fell by 0.9% to 1.2%, failing to continue the mood of the previous week, which rebounded for the first time in a few weeks. CNBC reported that "traders say the market doesn't have much to look at ahead of the CPI due on Friday (10th)," reports CNBC. However, there were also warnings that investor sentiment could shrink as there were speculations that a shock to the U.S. economy was approaching. In fact, Tesla CEO Elon Musk told executives last week in an email that he had a "very bad feeling about the economy." Meanwhile, this week, the earnings of food company Campbell Soup, Jack Daniel's maker Brown-Forman, and electronic signature company DocuSign will be announced. [Major agenda of the week] △ May 6th employment trend index △ April trade balance on 7th, consumer credit for April testimony from the Senate Treasury Secretary Janet Yellen △ Wholesale inventory for April 8th Campbell soup performance △ Weekly unemployment insurance claims on the 9th △ May 10 Real Income, May CPI [New York Stock Exchange Closing Market] The New York Stock Exchange closed down on the 3rd (Eastern Time). On the New York Stock Exchange (NYSE), the Dow Jones Industrial Average closed at 32,899.70, down 348.58 points (1.05%) from the previous day. The Standard & Poor's (S&P) 500 index fell 68.28 points (1.63%) to 4108.54, and the Nasdaq index, centered on technology stocks, closed at 102012.73, down 304.16 points (2.47%) from the battlefield. The Labor Department's employment report released on the same day suggested that the job market remains strong despite concerns over a slowdown in the US economy. After the announcement of the indicator, the stock price fell as the Treasury bond yield rose on concerns about the Federal Reserve (Fed) tightening. Tech giant Apple fell more than 3%, shares of Nvidia and Meta fell more than 4%, and Amazon and Alphabet fell more than 2%. Only energy-related stocks in the S&P 500 rose more than 1%, while the remaining 10 sectors all fell. Consumer discretionary, technology and telecom stocks fell more than 2%. [European Stock Market Closing Market] Stock markets in major European countries ended lower all at once on the 3rd (local time). The CAC40 index of the Paris stock market in France fell 0.23% to 6,485.30, and the DAX30 index of the Frankfurt Stock Exchange in Germany fell 0.17% to 14,460.09, respectively. The pan-European Euro Stoxx 50 index also closed 0.30% lower at 3,783.66. [Chinese stock market closing] The Chinese stock market closed higher on the 3rd. According to the Wind index, the Shanghai Composite Index rose 0.42% to 3195.46p, the Shenzhen Component Index rose 0.67% to 11628.31p, and the Startup Board Index jumped 1.21% to 2458.26p. On this day, the semiconductor sector continued its upper limit, and the automobile, rare earth permanent magnet, and auto parts sectors also rose significantly. Foreign capital increased significantly from the previous day, with a net inflow of 3.183 billion yuan. [Vietnam Stock Market Closing Market] The Vietnamese stock market closed lower on the 3rd. The benchmark VN index closed at 1287.98p, down 0.64p (0.05%) from the previous trading day, with 122 stocks rising and 229 stocks falling. The VN30 Index, which consists of the top 30 stocks by market capitalization of the Vietnamese stock market, rose 1.91p (0.14%) to close at 1327.40p, and 10 stocks rose and 17 stocks fell. The HNX index of the Hanoi Exchange, which focuses on small and mid-cap stocks, fell 1.30p (0.42%) to 310.48p, with 72 stocks rising and 131 stocks falling. The unlisted company UPCoM Exchange also fell 0.15p (0.16%) to 94.17p, with 155 stocks rising and 202 stocks falling. The trading value on the day was VND12.91 trillion (US$556.7 million), a decrease of 22% from the previous trading day. In the stock market by industry, 7 out of 25 sectors rose and 18 stocks fell. Banking -0.80%, Securities -0.69%, Insurance -0.86%, Construction and Real Estate -0.41%, Information and Communication (ICT) 2.07%, Wholesale -0.42%, Retail 2.36%, Machinery -0.08%, Logistics -0.28% , health/medical industry 0.04%, F&B industry -0.19%, and mining/oil industry 0.18% respectively. Foreign investors recorded a net sale of VND183 billion, continuing their net buying for the second day in a row. [International Oil Price] International oil prices showed an upward trend. On the 3rd (local time), Brent crude, the international oil price reference, rose by $1.80 (1.5%) from the previous day to $119.41 per barrel, and West Texas Intermediate (WTI), the reference for US oil prices, rose by $1.80 (1.5%) to $118.67 per barrel. closed [Gold] The international gold price showed a downward trend. On the 3rd (local time) on the New York Mercantile Exchange on the 3rd (local time), the August gold price fell 1.1% ($21.30) to close at $1,850.20 an ounce.

KAKAO Metaverse, KAKAO Universe Starts KAKAO's Metaverse Ecosystem Interest-Based Interest-Based Non-knowledge and Non-Purpose Communication Reinforcement Nam Goong-Hun "Aim for 5 billion users worldwide" KAKAO CEO Nam Goong-Hoon held an online press conference on the 7th to discuss KAKAO's metaverse concept' KAKAO Universe' is introduced. The blueprint for 'KAKAO Universe', the KAKAO version of the metaverse, has been released. ① Strengthen open chat based on ‘interests’ in the existing acquaintance-based messenger, ② On the KAKAO platform, from short form (short-length video) to chatbot, 3D virtual space metaverse, virtual human, social networking service (SNS), game It is an ambitious plan to bring global users into one ecosystem by integrating KAKAO CEO Nam Goong-hoon unveiled KAKAO's metaverse concept 'KAKAO Universe' at an online press conference held on the 7th and introduced the direction of service implementation through collaboration with KAKAO affiliates. According to KAKAO, the KAKAO universe means an ecosystem where people with common interests can communicate anytime, anywhere, freeing from the limitations of KAKAO, a messenger based on communication between acquaintances. Earlier, at the inaugural press conference held in April, CEO Namgung redefined Metaverse as a community where various users can gather together by overcoming the limitations of time and space, rather than a simple three-dimensional virtual space. KAKAO expressed its ambition to build a metaverse by taking advantage of its core competency, a 'text'-based platform. The starting point of the KAKAO universe is the open link service. Open Link is a service where users with common interests such as hobbies, places, and people can gather, communicate and enjoy. It will be provided based on KAKAO Talk open chat. Through the open link of KAKAO Piccoma Webtoon, users from Korea, Japan, and Indonesia can talk about webtoon in open chat, and users who met through the open link of a brunch run by a famous chef share restaurant information. KAKAO plans to activate the KAKAO universe by adding a non-purpose communication element to this. It is a method that strengthens the multi-profile function in the existing KAKAO Talk profile so that users can express 'multi-persona'. Using KAKAO Brain's super-giant artificial intelligence (AI) model, it is a technology that tracks facial movements in real time, and provides a function to automatically create various types of 3D characters. It is possible to communicate differently, such as role-playing with strangers in open chat. Along with strengthening the SNS function, things to enjoy such as 'Raising Your Own Pet' are also increasing. CEO Namgoong said, “Because of the limitation of expansion, KAKAO based on acquaintances is used by 50 million users, which is 1% of the world’s population. It will also captivate billions of users.” KAKAO plans to add a metaverse service that encompasses virtual reality beyond text, images, and video to this expanded communication field. Chatbots that can communicate with virtual characters, such as learning the character of the webtoon protagonist through 'conversational AI', and short-form video contents that provide various information are provided. It also strengthens the profit model by building a B2C2C ecosystem between creators and users. The final focus of the KAKAO universe is the 3D metaverse service 'Colorverse', which is being developed by Neptune, a KAKAO affiliate. Unlike existing metaverses such as Naver's ZEPETO and SK Telecom's Ifland, it is characterized by being able to move between mobile and online without installing a separate app. From the second half of this year, KAKAO plans to release the services of the KAKAO universe one after another. KAKAO Pay, Alipay Plunge due to block deal KAKAO Pay (377300) is the first to plummet. It is explained that the news that Alipay Singapore Holdings, the second largest shareholder, disposed of its 5 million shares in a block deal (out-of-hours mass trading) is acting as a bad news. According to the Korea Exchange on the 8th, as of 9:22 am, the stock price of KAKAO Pay is trading at 89,600 won, down 16,400 won (15.47%) from the previous day. According to the investment banking (IB) industry the previous day, after the market close, Alipay conducted an institutional demand forecast for its 5 million shares in KAKAO Pay. It is reported that all 5 million shares were sold at a discount of 11.8% from the closing price on the 7th. JP Morgan was in charge of the block deal sale. On the other hand, as of the end of the first quarter, Alipay is known to hold 51,015,205 shares of KAKAO (38.52% stake).

Gaekao Gathers Employee Opinions The Metaverse work system, which KAKAO ambitiously introduced, was revised after many controversies. The company announced an innovative working system on the 30th of last month with the goal of implementing it in July, but it was eventually self-reinforcing amid criticism that it was not 'employee monitoring'. KAKAO announced through an internal notice on the 8th that it would change the working method of the metaverse work system, voice channel connection and offline meeting once a week, from 'compulsory' to 'recommended'. It was also decided to reduce the intensive working hours (core time) by one hour. The previous intensive work hours were from 1 pm to 5 pm, but this time it has been changed to 2 pm to 5 pm. Earlier, on the 30th of last month, KAKAO announced the metaverse work system that allows people to work regardless of location. By connecting to the voice channel (Discord) in real time, it was conducted 4 days a week and face-to-face meetings were held on the other day. The company emphasized that it could be connected to a voice channel in real time and communicate with colleagues. CEO Nam Goong-hoon also emphasized, "The metaverse work system centered on connection will help crews work efficiently and support them so that they can be established as a culture that penetrates the KAKAO community." After the announcement of the metaverse working system, it faced harsh criticism from employees. It is argued that the system is a work system characteristic of the past Panopticon (a circular prison designed to manage a large number of prisoners with a small number of watchers). It is pointed out that the method of accessing Discord and leaving the speaker on for 8 hours or wearing bone conduction earphones is excessive. CEO Nam Goong-hoon hastily set out to fix it. On the 31st of last month, he said, "After testing for a certain period of time, employees will decide whether to use the voice communication tool through direct voting by organizational unit or functional unit." This decision is interpreted as a result of accepting such internal opinions. A KAKAO official said, "Only the 'ground rule', which is the working rule, has been changed. In addition, it is reported that the introduction of a nolgeum (non-working Friday) system is being considered. The nolgeum system will be introduced every other week and will be applied from the 1st of next month if implemented. The introduction of an in-house restaurant is also under discussion. As the prices around Pangyo are high, the employees are looking for a restaurant. A KAKAO official said, "The implementation of the in-house restaurant system is expected to be decided while observing the trend after the introduction of the metaverse work system." Far from rising stock prices, it's too late to quit comedy, whether it's an internal division that would be a bad news, so do it right from now on. it's boring

I'll write a few words for those who are anxious. I'm reading a book called The Smart Investor by Benjamin Graham. Among the articles written here, how should I invest in growth stocks? This is the average performance of growth stock funds, not individual stocks. If individual stocks are difficult, a fund will perform much better. I need to draw a table, but I can't draw a table here, so I'll show you a rough chart. 1 year 1970 5 years 66-70 10 years 61-70 Dividend yield 1970 17 large growth stock funds - 7.5% 23.2% 121.1% 2.3% Small growth stocks 196 funds Group A -17.7% 20.3% 102.1% 1.6% 38 small growth stock funds Group B - 4.7% 23.2% 106.7% 1.4% 15 funds with “growth stock” in their title -14.2% 13.8% 97.4% 1, 7% S&P 500 3.5% 16.1% 104.7% 3.4% Dow 8.7% 2.9% 83,0% 3.7% This is a table from the book. If you do a growth stock fund, this is the rate of return. If you think that the current funds are about -10%, it's not much different from now. Because it exposes you to a lot of volatility, it will be very difficult for those who are starting stocks or experiencing a decline for the first time in this bear market. However, there are people who do not have a hard time in a market like this. Those who invest only enough to not shake everything in their investment proportion. Put simply, putting in a lot of money is insecure. Your bowl gets smaller that much. Even if it goes down even a little, you can't stand it and you lose a stop. Conversely, even if it rises even a little, you can't stand it and you lose money. Figure out how much you can afford, and if you don't think it can withstand large volatility, give the investment. This is right. Money to buy a house Money saved for a lifetime. Never buy stocks with this kind of money, and it is right to put it in bonds or savings accounts. And if you think you're not good at any stock or market, do the fund. The best fund managers can make big money for your money for a small fee. Warren Buffett told his wife that if he died, I advised the S&P 500 to keep 90% bonds and 10% bonds. This is why the world's top 20 market caps 30 years ago were banking stocks/automobiles/construction stocks, etc. There were many Japanese companies. What would have happened, everything has changed. Simply put, the world has developed over the past 30 years. Then, the way I do not lose money in such a changing world is to invest in an index fund, so the fund managers can change stocks and eat the fruits. You think KAKAO is really good, so am I. Brutally, without explanation, the reason is revealed at the last stage of the great transformation, and when that happens, the sell-off peaks and the big market turns around. However, since no one kindly tells the reason, there are still a lot of people who advocate the undervaluation of the Korean stock market without knowing the seriousness. Interest rate is a natural thing to do, so in particular, interest rate hikes are good news for the stock market with little knowledge and experience, so it rebounds... The interest rate hike was considered a good news because it was a prerequisite for raising the interest rate because the current stock price is good and the future economy is good, but the rate hike is essentially a bad news. Nevertheless, it is an urgent situation to raise interest rates. Therefore, this crisis is hinting at the level of the Great Depression, and few outstanding people are implying that such a case has never happened in the history of the stock market except during the Great Depression, so it is a crisis comparable to the Great Depression. Because it’s a dog relationship, they never went side by side, and they go ahead and step back, so those who advocate the Korean stock market bottoming out at a PBR of 0.7 are just idiots. It is common to all industries, and among them, Korea is a store and corporate government, and even the real estate North Korean nuclear risk is literally a perfect storm. Explain only the basic principle of the universe. Everything in the universe is formed by unstable interactions of two different qualities. I'm writing this because I'm sad because I see people who are just starting out in stocks and say, "It's wrong to do stocks." It is difficult for anyone to predict the fluctuations of stocks in one day, two days, one month, two months, but it is easy to predict the fluctuations of ten years. Will stocks fall 10 years from now? If you think so, you can withdraw all your money invested in stocks right now. Short-term forecasting is really hard. You don't have to be happy to get it right. Of course, if you're lucky, you should always be humble in front of the stock market. No stocks ever fall and no stocks ever rise. Is there anyone around you who brags about how much money you made in stocks? During a bull market, there were a lot of people around who said that they made money with stocks. If one share of stock rises 10%, it rises by 10%. If 100 shares rise by 10%, it rises by 1000%. If 1000 stocks rise by 10%, it will increase by 10000%. Conversely, what happens when stocks fall? Yes. As we all know, the more stocks you have, the more you lose. Those who are new to stocks probably think this way. Institutions and outsiders play a prank on the stock price by raising the price when I buy and sell. No matter how much money you have, it is difficult to make an average price in the stock market, especially in large-cap stocks with such a large market capitalization. Of course, stock prices can be manipulated in places where you have double the amount of money in circulation. A stock rises when more people want to buy and falls when more people want to sell. What is the current state of the market? Even if it goes up a little, there are not one or two people who want to sell it when it reaches 5%, right? If so, what would happen if it was launched with a gap in the beginning? Since the account is a plus, there are many people who want to sell rather than hold. If there is a really big positive, you can absorb all the thrower's quantity and lift it up, right? But what if you put it on top? The person up there will try to sell it again, right? Now KAKAO has a lot of upstairs for sale. What do you need to digest that quantity? You need four hours. The more people who want to sell me, the longer it will take. So I'm telling you to take it slow. You may want to sell in a hurry, like people who bought in a hurry and got bitten by it. There are many types of people investing in stocks in the market. Until a while ago, people said that KAKAO was a really good stock. How is it now? Hehe It's overvalued with all kinds of bad news. Even if the market conditions changed, would it have been such a bad news that the stock price would have plunged like this? It has been steadily growing, and its sales and net income are steadily increasing. And with the money you earn, you buy back stock. This is the time when people who buy when others say they like it and sell when others say they don't like it. Why do they buy when they say it's bad, so 90% of the stock market loses money and only 10% makes money. You have to think differently from others. Those who survive -30% -70% eat +100% +200%. It may take years for this stock to go up again. If someone who needs to spend money right away or urgently bought this stock, it is correct to sell the stock and spend the money urgently. It is just saying that it is right for those who are going to collect things slowly and calmly. Today is the weekend, so I have a lot of time to write. There are a lot of people who want to make money quickly. Stocks are not gambling. With the money people bought stocks, companies raise money and use that money to make a better company. That's an investment.

Why is the current stock market crashing? I’ve been talking about it since a year ago.. The Moon Jae-ang government has listed hundreds of trillions of new public offering stocks, such as KAKAO, Krafton, and LG Energy Solution, through a public offering. If you do a 100% free issue, the stock price will be cut in half on the day the stock increases, right? It's the same principle. Money is limited in the stock market, but it is natural for the stock price to plummet if it is newly listed, not ten trillion won, but hundreds of trillion won. It also sold over 60 trillion won of stocks, and if you include institutions, it will be over 100 trillion won. So, how can the stock market survive? Even if the U.S. recovers, the Korean stock market is difficult. Newbies in stocks don't know that. It was like that during Kim Dae-jung and during Roh Moo-hyun.

(-2.59%) fell to 2528.64. On this day, the KOSPI broke the new low (2546.80) recorded on the 12th of last month. In the stock market, institutional investors and foreigners are net selling 73.7 billion won and 146.9 billion won, respectively. On the other hand, individuals are net buying 205.4 billion won alone. At the top of the market cap, Samsung Electronics (005930) fell 2.19% to 62,400 won, breaking new 52-week lows. The share price of Samsung Electronics has been on a downward trend as the recent inflation shock, concerns about an economic slowdown, and uncertainty in the semiconductor industry have highlighted the share price of Samsung Electronics. Naver and KAKAO (035720) also broke new 52-week lows both at the beginning of the market. In addition, LG Energy Solution (373220) (-2.00%), SK Hynix (-3.38%), Samsung Biologics (-2.19%), LG Chem (-3.43%), Hyundai Motor (-5.96%), Samsung SDI (- 1.25%) and other top-ranked stocks are falling all at once. The KOSDAQ also showed a 3% decline. At the same time, the KOSDAQ index fell 27.52 points (-3.16%) to 842.34 compared to the previous trading day. EcoproBM (247540) (-0.35%) in the top market cap, Celltrion Healthcare (091990) (-1.31%), KAKAO Games ( 293490) (-3.48%), HLB (028300) (-1.87%), Pearl Abyss (263750) (-3.71%), Celltrion Pharmaceutical (068760) (-2.50%), Wemade (112040) (-3.36%), etc. Most of them are on a downward trend. On the 10th (local time), the New York Stock Exchange plunged in the aftermath of the US Consumer Price Index (CPI) renewing its high in May. The U.S. Department of Labor reported that the CPI for May rose 8.6% from the same period last year. It surpassed the 8.5% increase recorded in March and is the fastest inflation rate in 41 years since December 1981. It also surpassed the Wall Street Journal (WSJ) expert forecast and the previous month's 8.3%. In the market, the Federal Reserve (Fed) will raise the key interest rate once at the June Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) regular meeting to be held from the 14th to the 15th. There is even an expectation that it can take a 'giant step', which raises 0.75 percentage points to the 'Giant Step'. The Nasdaq Index plunged 3.52% on the 10th as concerns about the strengthening of the Fed's tightening intensity were raised. % decline. Seo Sang-young, a researcher at Mirae Asset Securities, said, “The fact that the US stock market plunged after the announcement of the Consumer Price Index weakened expectations for an inflation slowdown, putting a burden on the Korean stock market. . Researcher Seo added, “The domestic stock market today will start to decline and show great volatility as we wait for the FOMC to be held this week.” We will continue to expand volatility while being adversely affected by the monthly FOMC event. “It is appropriate,” said Lee Kyung-min, a researcher at Daishin Securities. “If you look at the process of a sharp decline since the beginning of this year and a trough in May, excessive anxiety about US tightening and the economy rather than the fundamental (economic basics) variable leads to panic selling, adversely affecting supply and demand. “Even if there is a technical rebound and a relief rally in the KOSPI, we expected the downtrend to continue until the first half of 2023,” he said. He added, “I think the global financial market has already taken into account concerns about an economic recession caused by the US giant stepping rate reaching 3% or higher within this year.” It is recorded at 1287.40 won.

881 out of 932 KOSPI - 1388 out of 1,479 KOSDAQ Falls As the domestic financial market is greatly shaken by the price shock from the US, volatility is expected to continue for the time being. In the short term, experts are paying close attention to the results of the Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) meeting of the US Federal Reserve (Fed) scheduled for the 14th-15th (local time). The KOSPI, which pulled up at the 2,500 line, has to keep the bottom open, and the won-dollar exchange rate needs to be kept in mind at 1290 per dollar in the short term. On the 13th alone, the market cap of the KOSPI decreased by about 71 trillion won and the KOSDAQ by about 17 trillion won, and a total of 88 trillion won evaporated from the stock market. In the stock market, 881 (94.5%) of 932 KOSPI listed stocks fell, and 147 stocks recorded 52-week lows. 1,388 of the 1,479 stocks on the KOSDAQ fell, and the number of stocks that fell on the KOSDAQ was the largest since the KOSDAQ market opened in 1996. Samsung Electronics' '60,000 electronics' has reached a critical level. The stock closed at 62,100 won, down 1,700 won (2.66%) from the closing price of the previous trading day, as the outlook for the semiconductor industry deteriorated due to the stock market unrest. Naver and KAKAO, which are considered representative growth stocks, also broke new lows in the aftermath of the US Nasdaq's decline. Naver closed at 254,000 won, down 16,000 won (5.93%), and KAKAO at 76,500 won, down 3600 won (4.49%). Experts believe that it is safe to prepare for volatility for the time being. Kim Hyung-ryeol, head of Kyobo Securities' Research Center, said, "The 2,500 level is under threat right now, and if it is at this level, it is in the range of the index sufficiently reflecting the economic downturn, but the problem is that investors do not buy unconditionally just because it is cheap." He said, “Debating a rebound at this point in itself can be a hopeful advisor to investors. It appears to be,” he added. There are also concerns that if the Fed takes a giant step, the interest rates in the US and Korea will invert and supply and demand in the domestic stock market will deteriorate. Kim Young-hwan, a researcher at NH Investment & Securities, said, "Even if the Bank of Korea carries out an additional rate hike at the Monetary Policy Committee four times by the end of the year, a reversal of the Korea-US base rate seems inevitable." This led to concerns about the outflow of foreign funds, which led to a weakness in the KOSPI,” he said. As the won-dollar exchange rate rose close to 20 won during the day and peaked at 1288.9 won, the foreign exchange authorities intervened verbally. At about 1:35 pm on the same day, the foreign exchange authorities said, "The government and the Bank of Korea are monitoring the excessive volatility of the won in the domestic foreign exchange market recently. ” he said. The intervention on this day was unusual, stating that it was in the name of the director of the International Finance Bureau of the Ministry of Strategy and Finance and the director of the International Bureau of the Bank of Korea. It is said that not only verbal intervention, but also the amount that is presumed to be actual intervention.

How to Reduce KAKAO Loss There are options in futures, but there are also individual item futures. The way to reduce your account loss when it goes down is to sell and beat individual item futures. If KAKAO has 100 shares, you can sell 10 individual item futures. What you need to do is to determine the loss the moment you sell the futures. If you buy the futures, it doesn't matter whether you buy the stock or go up or down, but when volatility is high like now, it is a way to aim for future opportunities without losing money.

KOSPI's lowest level in 1 year and 7 months In the morning of the 14th, the KOSPI fell by nearly 1% and is moving below the 2,500 line. It is the first time in a year and seven months since November 13, 2020 that the KOSPI fell below the 2,500 line during the day. As a result of this day's decline, the KOSPI broke the record of the year's low for two consecutive days following the previous day. The KOSDAQ index is also down nearly 2%. As of 10:22 am on the same day, the KOSPI is pointing at 2476.97, down 27.54 points (1.10%) from the previous trading day. On this day, the KOSPI opened at 2472.96, down 31.55 points (1.26%) from the previous day, showing a large range of fluctuations in the early stage. At one time in the morning, the decline momentarily decreased and briefly returned to the 2500 level. By investment entity, individuals and foreigners are selling 96.7 billion won and 124.8 billion won, respectively, while institutions alone are buying 208.5 billion won. All but one of the top 10 stocks by market cap are declining. Samsung SDI traded at 525,000 won, down 4.37% from the previous trading day, with the largest decline. In addition, ▲Hyundai Motor (-3.14%) ▲LG Chem (-1.78%) ▲KAKAO (-1.05%) ▲NAVER (-0.79%) are also declining. LG Energy Solution rose 2.89% on the news of the expansion of the cylindrical battery production line, and is the only company among the top stocks by market cap. All sectors of the stock market are also on a downward trend. The sharp decline was mainly in medical precision (-2.79%), construction (-2.46%), and transportation equipment (-2.34%). Transportation warehouses (-0.24%) and electricity/electronics (-0.31%) showed relatively weak declines. At the same time, the KOSDAQ index is pointing to 813.55, down 15.22 points (1.84%) from the previous trading day. The KOSDAQ index started at 816.25, down 12.52 points (1.51%) from the previous trading day, and fluctuates as much as the KOSPI. By investment entity, individuals and foreigners net sold 41.7 billion won and 1.2 billion won, respectively, while institutions alone are buying 30.4 billion won. Stocks with the highest market cap on the KOSDAQ show different directions by industry. Secondary battery-related stocks such as EcoProBM (0.59%) and L&F (1.18%) are rising due to LG Energy Solution's capacity expansion. On the other hand, entertainment-related stocks such as WeMade, which fell by 11.78%, CJ ENM (-3.04%), and Pearl Abyss (-1.88%), are on the decline. Most of the KOSDAQ sectors are also down. The decline in re-opening-related industries such as food, beverage and tobacco (-3.30%), digital content (-3.15%), and entertainment culture (-2.99%) is notable. Transportation (0.17%) and IT parts (-0.46%) are doing well despite the downtrend. Seo Sang-young, head of the media content division at Mirae Asset Securities, said on the 14th, "The fact that the US stock market fell sharply due to the Fed's aggressive monetary policy issue will act as a further downward factor for the Korean stock market." The fact that the issue of economic recession has been highlighted as the difference between short- and long-term interest rates in the US has been narrowed along with the slowdown in the (OECD) leading economic index is also a factor in the weakening of investor sentiment related to supply and demand by foreigners.”

On the 14th, Seok-Yeol Yoon, what are you doing? In addition, the Democratic Party of Korea criticized on the 14th that the Yoon Seok-Yeol government was not taking active measures despite the worsening economic conditions such as inflation and stock price collapse. At the same time, he announced that he would launch a 'People's Livelihood First Action Group' to take care of 6 pending issues of livelihood, and start this week to check the actual situation, including field visits, and establish countermeasures. Park Hong-geun, floor leader of the Democratic Party, pointed out at the meeting of the floor plan held at the National Assembly this morning, "I can't see the leadership and control tower to solve the high prices." He said, "In response to criticism that the government should do something about the high oil prices that are invalid, President Yun Seok-yeol announced yesterday (13th) that he would push for measures to ease the burden on the people. Although it was a long time late, he called it a preemptive measure." . He added, "There has been no high-level party meeting to come up with price measures for over a month since the inauguration of the Yun administration. The two economic ministerial meetings were only ineffective measures." Floor leader Park criticized the Yoon administration for being bystanders despite signs of a decline in stock prices. He said, "Yesterday, the KOSPI plummeted due to fears of austerity from the United States. If you include the KOSDAQ, including the KOSDAQ, the stock price of 99 of the top 100 stocks by market capitalization fell, and 88 trillion won flew out of the Korean stock market. "There is no news that an emergency response meeting has been convened in this extraordinary situation, where stock prices plummet and the exchange rate soars. This shows the total incompetence and irresponsibility of the Yun administration's economic policies." He continued, "The president is only shouting out the blunt and principled slogan, 'Do your best', and the government is neglecting the painful reality of people's livelihood through the habit of squeezing." It seems that they forgot whether it was the ruling party or the opposition party because they were doing it,” he criticized. The Democratic Party plans to launch the 'People's Livelihood First Practice Group' on this day. The floor leader Park directly serves as the group leader, and the executive committee consists of members of the standing committee as the team leader by dividing current issues of livelihood into six areas. Starting on the 15th, starting this week, they plan to check the actual situation, such as visiting the site, and establish countermeasures. "I will be a strong force in resolving the problem of people's livelihoods, and I will focus so that changes in the party can be ignited from the field of livelihood," said floor leader Park.

500 of the world's richest people, about 1801 trillion won evaporation As the global stock market entered a bear market, the wealth of the world's 500 richest people 'evaporated' about 1.4 trillion dollars (about 1801 trillion won) this year. This is in stark contrast to last year, when fortunes were raised thanks to the COVID-19 pandemic and accommodative monetary policy. According to Bloomberg News on the 14th (local time), as a result of analyzing the Bloomberg Billionaires Index, the wealth of the world's 500 richest people has decreased by about 1.4 trillion dollars this year, with 206 billion dollars (about 265 trillion won) disappearing on the 13th. According to Bloomberg, financial markets around the world are suffering from uncertainty due to interest rate hikes and inflation. The world's five richest people lost $345 billion this year. Elon Musk, CEO of Tesla, the world's richest electric car maker with a fortune of $17.1 billion (about 253 trillion won), lost 73.2 billion dollars (about 94 trillion won) this year. Tesla stock has fallen more than 46% this year. The fortunes of Jeff Bezos, founder of e-commerce company Amazon, Bernard Arnault, chairman of luxury group Louis Vuitton Moët Hennessy (LVMH), and Mark Zuckerberg, CEO of platform company Meta (former Facebook) are each $60 billion (about 77 trillion won) this year. ) has disappeared. Changpeng Zhao, CEO of cryptocurrency exchange Binance, lost 85.6 billion dollars (about 110 trillion won), the most among five people as the cryptocurrency market shook. Bloomberg said the trend was in stark contrast to last year, when the value of all assets soared. According to the recently released World Wealth Report by consulting firm Capgemini, the net worth of the global population increased by about 8% last year compared to the previous year. In the Asia-Pacific region, where the number of wealthy people has increased rapidly over the past decade compared to the United States and Europe, the number of wealthy people only increased by 4.2% compared to the previous year. The Chinese government's regulations on big tech companies and the cooling of the real estate market were the causes. In contrast, the US stock market showed a sharp rise last year, thanks to which the net asset value of North America rose 13% year-on-year, above the average. However, the huge liquidity released in the market led to inflation this year, and the color of the market changed when the US central bank, the Federal Reserve (Fed), started raising interest rates. Nevertheless, according to the Capgemini World Wealth Report, the polarization of wealth continued. Those with more than $30 million in investable assets increased their wealth by 9.6% compared to the previous year. In contrast, those with investable assets of $1 million (about 1.2 billion won) to $5 million (about 6.4 billion won) raised 7.8% of their wealth during the same period. The report also said that most of the world's richest people still live in the United States, Japan, China and Germany. 64% of the world's net worth is concentrated in these countries.

Short selling seeks to secure a quantity that is cheaper than the time of the sell order by using this time difference. In other words, they want to hand over the flesh (the initial quantity) and the bones (the surrendered item). This is how it works. First, the quantity waiting for a simultaneous quote is signed in the order of price>time>quantity, so a large number of purchases are queued for loading. Second, we short-sell to reach the lowest point to be concluded) |||||| ??Third, take the offering for surrender at the lowest point and fill in the upper bid) ||||||| In short selling, as much as the purchase volume has been digested, the higher price of the surrendered property that exceeds the initial volume) ||||| must be collected in So, how many times do you fill in the waiting list, but after that, the ants stick around? Web board game regulation The government meeting passed on June 14th, and the long-standing web board game regulation took a little breather Input by reporter Won-bin Moon, Edit Jun 14, 2022 15:04 Edit Jun. 14, 2022 15:04 Payment limit increased from 500,000 won to 700,000 won Passed by the State Council... Expected to increase industry sales - Web board game in Google Play service - Web board game in Google Play service passed the State Council. Good news is expected for sales recovery in related industries that have been hurt by long-standing regulations. The bill decided by the State Council is 'Partial Amendment to the Enforcement Decree of the Game Industry Promotion Act'. The key is to raise the limit on the purchase of game money for web board games by 200,000 won from the previous 500,000 won to 700,000 won. In addition, it clarifies the phrase that you cannot choose the other party to play the game in order to block illegal currency exchange, and stipulates compliance with the measures to protect users and prevent speculative game products made in consultation with the Game Management Committee. Although the presidential approval remains after the passage of the State Council, there are no obstacles in view of the fact that there is no disagreement among related ministries such as the Ministry of Culture, Sports and Tourism. Judging from the customs, it is expected that it will be implemented in July. Web board game payment limits were first introduced in 2014. Due to speculative reasons, there are limits on one-time usage limit, monthly payment limit, and daily loss limit. The monthly payment limit started at 300,000 won and rose to 500,000 won in 2016. The work loss limit, which was limited to 100,000 won, was abolished in 2020. This regulation is a sunset type and is reviewed every two years. This year, the industry's opinion that the payment limit should be raised to reflect the rise in inflation was accepted. Payment limit regulation has collapsed the web board game industry. According to the Korea Game Industry Association, the domestic web board game market, which exceeded KRW 630 billion, plunged to KRW 220 billion in 2016. Under the name of speculation concerns, the market has been cut by a third. The web board game industry is expected to benefit from deregulation. When the monthly payment limit was raised in 2016, it is estimated that there was a 15% increase in sales in the web board game industry. In a conference call last month, NHN CEO Jung Woo-jin said, "If the payment limit rises, we expect a 10-20% increase in performance indicators." The web board game industry welcomes the passage of the enforcement ordinance by the State Council, but is wary of whether speculative issues will arise. A web board game company said, "As the revision of the Enforcement Decree has the purpose of rationally adjusting related regulations by reflecting the growth trend of the game industry, we will comply with the amendment and continue to strive for the even growth of the game industry." said Reporter Won-bin Moon

■■■ Web board game companies beneficiary... Payment limit raised from 500,000 won to 700,000 won Passed by the Cabinet meeting... Expected to increase industry sales Expected to benefit from web board game companies... Web board game regulations are a little breathless Opened Reporter Name Reporter Won-bin Moon Input 2022.06.14 15:03 Edited 2022.06.14 15:04 Payment limit increased from 500,000 won to 700,000 won Passed by the Cabinet meeting... Expectations for industry sales growth - Web board games on Google Play service - A bill to raise the monthly payment limit for web board games on Google Play service from 500,000 won to 88 to 700,000 won was passed by the State Council on the 14th. Good news is expected for sales recovery in related industries that have been hurt by long-standing regulations. ..... It is the first time in 6 years that the monthly purchase limit has been revised. This regulation is a two-year sunset-type regulation, and its feasibility is reviewed once every two years. In 2016, the second year of introduction, the monthly payment limit was increased from 300,000 won to 500,000 won, and it remained the same for six years. The web board game industry has been constantly pushing for deregulation, but the Game Management Committee did not accept it. In 2020, the one-day loss limit was only abolished through the establishment of measures to prevent speculation. The amendment to the Enforcement Decree of the Game Act, which has been announced, will take effect after collecting opinions by April 4th. As it is not a law but an enforcement ordinance, it is only necessary to pass the procedures such as the Ministry of Legislative Affairs review, the Vice Ministers' meeting, and the State Council meeting after the notice of legislation. The industry is also cautiously predicting the passage of the amendment. This is because the limit needs to be raised to keep pace with inflation, etc., which have risen over the past six years. However, opposition from civic groups and others is a variable. ◇Web board game companies are expected to benefit... But it will rise again after 10 years, but web board game companies such as NHN and Neowiz are expected to benefit from this deregulation. If the monthly payment limit is raised to 700,000 won as previously announced, the payment limit per plate will also increase from 50,000 won to 70,000 won. This is because, according to the enforcement rules, the payment limit per plate must be less than 1/10 of a month. As the limit on the amount of payment per user is raised by 40%, the sales of game companies are also expected to increase. In fact, NHN's game sales have increased in the past due to deregulation. NHN is running the famous Hangame site for web board games. As the payment limit was raised from 300,000 won to 500,000 won in 2016, game sales also increased 13% from 416.1 billion won in 2015 to 472.9 billion won. Neowiz's sales also fluctuated significantly due to regulations. In 2014, due to web board regulations, sales fell from 400 billion won to 200 billion won. After that, in 2020, the one-day loss limit was abolished. Neowiz's domestic game sales in 2020 were 303.1 billion won, up 53% from the previous year (197.5 billion won). It is also noteworthy that the web board game has good compatibility with the P2E model, which is a hot topic in the game industry. Until now, the web board field was a market where most game companies did not enter new markets due to regulations. However, as P2E games, also known as 'money-making games', have recently received attention in the industry, several game companies are putting their power back into web board games. In order to preoccupy the P2E market, which has recently emerged as a future food, it has re-launched its specialty web board game. .... ■■■■■■ P2E leader... Game master... Inflation stops only when oil prices are stable and raw material prices are stable. What is now being misunderstood is the delusion that inflation will unconditionally catch if interest rates are raised. Inflationary pressures will continue to weigh on them throughout the year. It's going down a lot now, so it's going to skyrocket, but inflation is still going on, raw material prices and oil prices are also informed. U.S. prices are hard to come by. Then the Fed will keep raising interest rates. But the problem is not with general consumption, but with raw material grains, and raising interest rates doesn't work. If you continue to trial and error, the market will be wrecked. Inflation is on the rise, but you can't let the interest rate go just because it doesn't work. Then, whenever interest rates rise, growth stocks are harpooned. Eventually, the war will be over. But who knows the end of the war? The peak may not be this year or it may be this year, but now is not the stage to bet with hasty predictions. Borrow or just take it with you, just forget a year and buy it. Finally, the KOSDAQ also renewed the year-low low The KOSPI broke a new low as foreign investors began selling ahead of the US Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC). The KOSDAQ also recorded a new low for the first time in about a year and 7 months, below the 800 line. According to Yonhap Infomax New Stock Composite (screen number 3536) on the 15th, the KOSPI finished trading at 2,447.38, down 45.59 points (1.83%) from the previous day. The KOSPI rose to the 2,495 level at the beginning of the market, then widened the decline. At 2:29 pm, it fell to 2436.04. As a result, it recorded a soft bottom below 2,457.39 the previous day. The KOSPI fell due to foreign net selling. In the KOSPI 200 futures index market, foreigners net sold 151.8 billion won worth. Institutions eased the burden on the KOSPI by switching to intraday net buying. From the beginning of the market, the KOSPI widened its decline. Although the three major New York indices showed mixed results last night, fears of a giant step (75bp increase) by the US Federal Reserve grew stronger, led by foreigners. As the yield on the two-year U.S. Treasury note and 10-year Treasury bond rose to 3.36% and 3.42%, respectively, the burden on growth stocks increased and related stock prices fell. Shares of NAVER [035420] and KAKAO [035720] fell 3.36% and 5.09%, respectively. Investors are paying attention to the results of the FOMC regular meeting to be announced on the 16th (Korean time). In the Asian market, the price of West Texas Intermediate (WTI) for July futures rose 0.38 dollars (0.32%) to 119.31 dollars per barrel. The dollar-won exchange rate closed at 1,290.50 won, up 4.10 won from the previous day. In the stock market, individuals and institutions net bought stocks worth 346.2 billion won and 73.4 billion won, respectively. Foreigners net sold 468.7 billion won worth of stocks. Most of the companies with the highest market capitalization fell. Samsung Electronics and LG Energy Solutions fell 1.94% and 1.52%, respectively, from the previous day. SK Hynix fell 1.21%, and Samsung Biologics rose 0.77%. By industry, the insurance industry rose the most with 0.99%, and the paper and wood industry fell the most with 5.26%. In exchange-traded funds (ETFs), KINDEX Mainland China CSI300 leverage (synthetic) was strong at 7.25%, and HANARO Fn K-POP&Media showed weakness at 7.49%. The KOSDAQ index closed at 799.41, down 24.17 points (2.93%) from the previous day. Due to the nature of the KOSDAQ index, which has a large proportion of growth stocks, the decline was widened due to the valuation burden. As a result, the KOSDAQ index fell below the 800 line based on the closing price after October 30, 2020, and recorded a new low. On that day, the trading value of the KOSPI and KOSDAQ was 9.824 trillion won and 8.283 trillion won, respectively. Heo Jae-hwan, a researcher at Eugene Investment & Securities, said, "It can be interpreted as a sense of FOMC alertness, but the KOSPI has fallen sharply compared to Australia and Japan." Investors will pay attention to the changes.” According to Yonhap Infomax Upbit Synthesis (screen number 2291), Bitcoin is trading at 27.81 million won, down by 1,019,000 won (3.53%) from the previous day.

Heads of fiscal, monetary and financial authorities gather to discuss macro-financial meeting Heads of finance, monetary and financial authorities met on the 16th when the US Federal Reserve (Fed) Federal Open Market Committee (FOMC) decided to raise the key interest rate by 0.75% Uncertainty in the financial market Concerned about the expansion, we decided to take an active response. Deputy Prime Minister and Minister of Strategy and Finance Choo Kyung-ho, Bank of Korea Governor Lee Chang-yong, Financial Services Commission Vice Chairman Kim So-young, Financial Supervisory Service Chairman Lee Bok-hyeon, and Presidential Office Chief Economic Affairs Officer Choi Sang-mok held an emergency macroeconomic and financial meeting at the Bank Hall in Seoul on the morning of the same day and discussed these issues. It is the first time in four months that the heads of fiscal, monetary and financial authorities have held a macroeconomic and financial conference, and it is the first time under a new government. They said, "There is a constant concern that volatility in the international financial market will increase as concerns about an economic slowdown due to accelerating austerity measures in the future." said. Diagnosing that the current economic situation is a complex crisis as the prolonged Ukraine crisis and supply chain disruptions overlap, they also formed a consensus that “the difficulties will continue for a considerable period of time.” The fiscal, monetary and financial authorities decided to actively cooperate and respond to price stability, easing market fluctuations, and financial risk management to overcome the complex crisis. First, they gathered a common understanding that “inflation stability is the most urgent issue.” They emphasized, "We will strengthen various efforts to respond to inflation, such as reducing the cost burden on the supply side, and preventing the spread of expected inflation, along with monetary policy that focuses more on inflation." Regarding the financial and foreign exchange markets, he said, "As uncertainty has increased, we will strengthen our joint response efforts to prevent the spread of anxiety." They explained, "In the case of the foreign exchange market, we will try not to intensify the phenomenon of concentration due to psychological overreaction while maintaining special vigilance against excessive volatility of the won." "In the bond market, if the market reacts excessively, we will push ahead with the government's emergency buyback and the BOK's simple purchase of government bonds at an appropriate time," he added. In order to manage potential risk factors such as the soundness of financial institutions, he said, "We will do our best to prevent systemic risks in advance by intensively examining the weak links between the soundness and liquidity of individual financial companies and the financial industry." / Yesterday, when the FOMC decided to raise the base interest rate by 0.75%, it was reported that the market instability was resolved. It is better not to be included in the MSCI, a developed country index, It is not expected that this year will be easy for Korea to be included in the Morgan Stanley Capital International (MSCI) advanced countries index, which can raise the level of the stock market one step further. MSCI released the market accessibility evaluation results on the 9th (local time) ahead of the announcement of the countries to be reviewed (watchlist) on the 24th, but it was pointed out that Korea has still not improved in terms of opening the foreign exchange market and allowing short selling. Although the domestic stock market is already under strong downward pressure due to internal and external adverse events, if an attempt to be included in the developed country index fails again, the aftermath is expected to be considerable. In the market, there is also an assessment that the results may vary depending on what kind of efforts the government is making. On the same day, MSCI released the results of market accessibility evaluations by major countries through its website. According to MSCI, market accessibility assessments are conducted to provide information to global institutional investors and to inform governments of global standards (world standards). The reason the Korean government and the financial investment industry paid great attention to this evaluation is that it can be used for inclusion in the MSCI developed countries index. MSCI also said in a press release released on the same day, "Market access is a criterion for classifying the market into advanced markets, emerging markets and frontier markets, along with the degree of economic development, market size, and liquidity." However, in the preliminary evaluation to enter the developed country index, Korea actually received a failing point as in the past. It was pointed out that there was no improvement in most of the items. In particular, it was evaluated that it worsened in the field of foreign investment limit. It seems that SK Telecom's issue of exhausting the foreigner limit has had an impact. MSCI is the first to point out the problem of inequality in information access, saying that Korean companies are not providing sufficient English information for foreign investors. It is pointed out that it is difficult for foreign investors to obtain company information due to the lack of information on the company information session in English. MSCI also pointed out the problem of corporate governance of Korean companies that do not conform to global standards. Another pointed out that there is no foreign exchange market where foreign investors can freely exchange dollars into dollars 24 hours a day. Although MSCI is persistently demanding that Korea be included in the index of developed countries for the opening of the foreign exchange market, the Korean government is unable to reach a conclusion easily due to concerns about dollar outflows and sharp fluctuations in the exchange rate. MSCI pointed out that the part that allows limited short selling of large-cap stocks such as the KOSPI 200 and KOSDAQ 150 also needs improvement. MSCI said in its report that "no timeline has been proposed for the possibility of resuming short selling for the rest of the shares." In this regard, the financial authorities under the Moon Jae-in administration planned to remove all restrictions on short selling in the first half of this year. In the meantime, however, the government as well as the heads of financial authorities have all changed. As the domestic stock market is weaker than ever due to internal and external adverse factors such as inflation, tightening, interest rate hikes, and supply chain disturbances, the market expects that it will be difficult to lift all restrictions on short selling in the first half of the year. Ji-young Han, a researcher at Kiwoom Securities, said, "If the registration of candidates for inclusion in the developed country index fails on the 24th, there will be disappointment." Considering that it will take more than a year, this evaluation result will only act as a neutral material.” If it is not on the list of countries to be reviewed for inclusion in the developed country index on the 24th, the opportunity will pass to June next year. The current short selling problem is a dusty mountain when included in the developed country index. That is, the situation where individuals have suffered and been treated as puppets is a joke compared to after being incorporated. The level of slaves who give money for the nation-states There is nothing more, nothing less than the level of slavery. There are more people than now, and the overviews are set up according to the overview, and Korea is included in the developed countries index. Far from being advantageous, the situation is more unfavorable than it is now, and in a situation where people in Korea are treated more as masters, they are indebted to poison and privately stocked for the sake of the people of the country. The Financial Relations Supervisory Service is also talking about allowing non-borrowed short selling, saying that more foreign investors are needed From now on, it's the peak, the reporters are on the other side. Any journalist is at a disadvantage when included in the developed country index, so no conscientious reporter talking about improvement. It's better not to do MCSI because it's an individual view of the game Dime situation I was pointed out that nothing happened./ It would be obvious what the individuals would be like if they allowed more short selling here. Even now, even if the music sounds like a lot of music, they only care about the money of the people of the country. The problem of debt owing to stocks is large, and banks, led by the Korea Financial Relations Service, have strengthened their loan-related relationships. Rather than that vicious cycle, MSCI is unconditionally better than the vicious cycle. The only thing that repeats is the Financial Relations Supervisory Service, brokerage firms, and journalists, etc. The current credit ratio is still serious. Stocks that have been watching for more than 5 months are naive, but from that time on, the number of months is more than 6 months. The amount of counter trading was 26 billion won, the highest level in four months. As the KOSPI fell to the 2400 level for seven consecutive trading days, the troubles of Donghak ants who invested in debt are deepening. It was found that the amount of counter-trading in which stocks held because they failed to meet the collateral ratio were forcibly liquidated reached 26 billion won. According to the Financial Investment Association on the 16th, as of the 14th, the amount of counter-trading compared to receivables from consignment sales was 26.34 billion won. On the previous day (13th), it recorded 16,585 billion won, and the amount of counter trading increased by 9.5 billion won in just one day. This is the highest level in four months since February 15 (27.03 billion won). Compared to the day of the highest number of counter-trading in June 2019, before the Corona 19 incident (19th, 8.83 billion won), it surged nearly three times. Counter-trading refers to a transaction in which a securities company forcibly sells and disposes of stocks regardless of the customer's will, if a customer borrows money from a securities company or purchases stocks with a credit loan, and then fails to repay the borrowed money within the agreed maturity period. say The repayment period is usually 3 days for receivable transactions, in which individual investors borrow money from a securities company, and 1 to 5 months for credit transactions. conduct a trade. If you don't, you can fall into a so-called 'tin can' account where you can't pay off all the borrowed money even if you sell all your stocks. Overdue interest must be paid on the outstanding amount remaining after the counter sale. If the domestic stock market has recently plummeted and investor sentiment for risky assets is weakening, if there is an increase in counter-trading, the stock market may be flooded, increasing downward pressure on the stock price. The monthly average counter-trading amount decreased from January to March, but increased again from April. The daily average of 14.8 billion won in counter trading in March increased to 15.6 billion won in April and 16.5 billion won last month. This is interpreted as the effect that investors did not pay back borrowed money on time as the domestic stock market unfolded this year. Both the KOSPI and KOSDAQ indexes broke new lows on the 15th. The KOSPI closed at 2447.38, down 45.59 points (1.83%) from the previous trading day. It is the first time in one year and seven months since November 9, 2020 (2447.20) that the KOSPI fell to the 2,440 line based on the closing price. The KOSDAQ index fell below the 800 line based on the closing price for the first time in a year and 10 months. On this day, the KOSPI and KOSDAQ indices rebounded by 1% and 2%, respectively, but there is still anxiety in the domestic stock market amid fears of inflation. While counter trading is on the rise, the balance of credit loans to invest in stocks with debt is not decreasing. As of the 14th, it was counted at 21.6086 trillion won, which almost doubled considering that it was only around 10 trillion won on average before Corona 19. The balance of credit loans has exceeded 20 trillion won since February 3 last year. Soon, the second song will come out as a bomb against Korean stocks.

The area that Russia has occupied in Ukraine in this war is much larger than the total area of the Republic of Korea. Even if Ukraine concedes territory to Russia, it does not end there. Ukraine will face an endless civil war. In a nutshell, it means that the Ukrainian people will fight each other with their guns as they are divided by Russia like Korea. On the 17th, KAKAO (035720), which works four days a week, started operating a remote working system in pilot form from July 4, and announced internally that it would work four days a week by introducing the 'biweekly nolgeum (playing Friday)' system. said. The company previously stated that it was the Metaverse work system, which made it mandatory to wear bone conduction earphones when working remotely, but as a result of objections from employees, it was changed to a method of 'recommending' the use of voice channels. The crew (employees) can freely work at the location chosen by them. Intensive working hours have also been reduced from 1 to 5 p.m. to 2 to 5 p.m. It is recommended to meet offline once a week. The 'biweekly nolgeum' system will be newly implemented from July 8. Biweekly Nolgeum is a system in which people work only 4 days a week by designating Friday as a day off every other week. The sabbatical/refresh leave system, which provides 30 days of leave to crews who have worked for 3 years, will remain the same. KAKAO plans to further develop the working system by listening to the opinions of crews through data analysis on working patterns and surveys for crews during the pilot period of the shift system. The goal is to go through a pilot process and officially implement it in January 2023. Meanwhile, KAKAO plans to increase the work efficiency of the crew by configuring the new working space 'KAKAO Pangyo Hideout' to be opened on July 4 as a space optimized for the working system.

Sales of KAKAO Mobility, Strong Opposition by Employees KAKAO (035720) The union membership rate of Mobility employees exceeded 50%. The employees are working together to actively express their opposition to the recent rumors about the sale. It is known that KAKAO Mobility is the first affiliate of the KAKAO community (group) with a union membership rate exceeding 50%. According to the industry on the 17th, as of the evening of the previous day, the number of KAKAO Mobility employees who joined the KAKAO union 'Crew Union' exceeded 360, including those waiting to join. The total number of employees of KAKAO Mobility is about 700. The number of union members, which was only 35 in January of this year, increased to 140 as of the 15th, exceeding the majority in one day. The reason KAKAO Mobility employees are joining the union in large numbers is because of the recent sale rumors. According to the investment banking (IB) industry, MBK Partners, the largest private equity fund in Korea, proposed the sale of KAKAO Mobility to KAKAO around February this year, and it has been confirmed that negotiations are ongoing. KAKAO is the largest shareholder of KAKAO Mobility, with a 57.5% stake. The target for sale is about 40% of KAKAO's stocks. In response to this, KAKAO released an clarification, saying, “No decision has been made,” but the industry consensus is that there is a sufficient possibility of a sale. At the time of the contract that invested in KAKAO Mobility in 2017, TPG offered an exit (recovery of funds) until this year as a condition, but as the recent market slump has put the brakes on IPO (IPO), the only remaining option is to sell. because it is The fact that KAKAO Mobility has been caught up in the controversy over 'infringement of alley commercial rights' due to price hikes since the end of last year is also a big concern for KAKAO, which is working hard to improve its brand image. KAKAO Mobility employees are greatly shaken after hearing about the sale. Despite friction with the taxi industry and criticism from the political circles, it quietly built the nation's No. An employee of KAKAO Mobility said, "Isn't this the case with responsible management emphasized at the headquarters?" The fact that the counterparty to the sale is a private equity fund is also a point of concern for employees. It is analyzed that treatment and welfare may retreat, as well as focusing on short-term profitability improvement rather than long-term growth. In response, KAKAO Mobility employees are actively encouraging their co-workers to join the union, saying, “It is absolutely impossible to just sell it.” Meanwhile, as the agitation of the employees grew, CEO Ryu Geung-sun plans to participate in 'All Hands', a meeting for employees held this afternoon, to reveal his position on the sale rumors. All Hands is a monthly meeting for KAKAO Mobility employees. It was originally held online, but it is known that the event will be held online and offline at the same time in response to the union's request. Digging a hawk's grave is his specialty = Gaekao.

Short selling seeks to secure a quantity that is cheaper than the time of the sell order by using this time difference. In other words, they want to hand over the flesh (the initial quantity) and the bones (the surrendered item). This is how it works. First, the quantity waiting for a simultaneous quote is signed in the order of price>time>quantity, so a large number of purchases are queued for loading. Second, we short-sell to reach the lowest point to be concluded) |||||| ??Third, take the offering for surrender at the lowest point and fill in the upper bid) ||||||| In short selling, as much as the purchase volume has been digested, the higher price of the surrendered property that exceeds the initial volume) ||||| must be collected in So, how many times do you fill in the waiting list, but after that, the ants stick around? There are situations in which you need to lower the price further or raise it sharply. What is clear is that short sales must also be repaid when the actual settlement is reached. ? Currently, short sellers do not receive as much surrendered property as the initial volume they handed over. ??A short sale that does not secure a cheaper amount (a surrendered sale) than the borrowed stock (initial amount) will result in a definite loss.
